Question: Zhongshan Camry Electronic Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Zhongshan Camry Electronic Co., Ltd

CES 2024

- Smart Body Fat Scale
- Smart Nutritional Scale
- Electronic Body Fat (Personal) Scale
- Electronic Kitchen Scale
- Commercial Scale
- Other scales for household and commercial use
- Annual output of 16 million pieces
- Factory covers 187,000 m², with 2,000 staff
- 27 assembly lines producing up to 2.8 million scales monthly
- 45 new designs offered annually
- Professional R&D team with 100+ development and testing projects
- Quality reputation guaranteed by 35 IQC, 40 QA, and 180 sets of quality testing machines
- Registered CAMRY brand inscribed in 39 countries and areas
- Registered SENSSUN brand designed for smart products
- ISO9001 accredited since 1998

- 智能体脂称

- 27条生产线，月产量280万件秤
- 每年推出45个新设计
- 专业的研发团队，有100多个开发和测试项目

- CAMRY品牌在39个国家和地区注册
